Value.label: Night Light
Value.Help: By default, the LED on the LRM-AS will turn OFF when the load attached is turned ON. To make the LED turn ON when the load attached is turned ON, set parameter to a value of 0.

Value.label: Invert Switch
Value.Help: To change the top of the switch to OFF and the bottom of the switch to ON, set parameter to 1.

Value.label: Load Sense
Value.Help: Set this parameter to 0 to disable load sense. Set this parameter to 1 to enable load sense
